Translations.Text: Yi yingxu jingwei zhe de leyuan, qi qingzhuang shi zheyang de: Na leyuan xia lin zhu he, qizhong de guoshi shi yongheng de, qizhong de yin ying yeshi yongheng de. Zhe shi jingwei zhe de guobao; bu xindao zhe de guobao shi huo yu.

Meng wo shangci jingdian de ren xihuan jiang shi gei ni de jingdian, tongmeng zhe dangzhong, youren fouren zhe jingdian de yibufen. Ni shuo: Wo zhi fengming chongbai zhenzhu, er bu yi wu pei ta, wo zhi haozhao ren chongbai ta, wo zhi guiyi ta.

Wo zheyang ba ta jiang shi wei alabo wen de zhihui. Zai zhishi jianglin ni zhihou, ruguo ni shuncong tamen de yuwang, namo, ni dui zhenzhu de (chengfa) jue wu renhe baohu zhe, ye jue wu renhe baowei zhe.
Zai ni zhiqian, wo que yi paiqianle xuduo shizhe, bing shangci tamen qizi he ernu. Chufei feng zhenzhu de mingling, renhe shizhe buneng zhaoshi jixiang. Mei ge qixian, ge you panding.
Zhenzhu renyi gouxiao he queding (jingdian de mingwen), zai ta na li you tian jing de yuanben.
Ruguo wo ba wo yong lai donghe tamen de xingfa zhaoshi ni yidian er,(na hui shi ni manyi), ruguo wo shi ni shou zhong, name, ni zhi fu chuanda de zeren, wo zifu qingsuan de zeren.
Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Wo dao tamen di difang lai suoxiao tamen de bianjing. Zhenzhu ziyou panjue, renhe ren buneng fankang qi panjue. Ta shi qingsuan shensu de.
Zai tamen zhiqian de ren, que yi shiyong jimou; dan yiqie jimou, zhi guizhenzhu, ta zhidao mei ge linghun de mouqiu.

Bu xindao zhe jiangyao zhidao, jinshi de shan guo jiang gui shei suoyou. Bu xindao de renmen shuo: Ni bushi shizhe. Ni shuo: Zhenzhu zuyi wei wo he nimen zhi jian de jianzheng, renshi tian jing de ren ye zuyi wei wo he nimen zhi jian de jianzheng.

Ai lie fu, lia mu, la yi.(Zhe shi) yi zhang jing, wo ba ta jiang shi ni, yibian ni feng zhu de mingling er ba zhongren cong chongchong hei'an zhong yinru guangming, yinru qiangda de, ke song de zhu de dadao.
Zhenzhu shi you tiandi wanwu de. Ai zai bu xindao zhe! Tamen jiang shou yanli de xingfa.
Tamen ning yao jinshi, er buyao houshi, bing zu'ai zhenzhu de dadao, erqie xiang zai qizhong xunqiu pian xiedao, zhe deng ren shi zai shen shen de mi wu zhi zhong de.

Wo bu paiqian yige shizhe ze yi, dan paiqian de shihou, zong shi yi ta de zongzu de yuyan (jiang shi jingdian), yibian ta wei tamen chanming zhengdao. Er zhenzhu shi tasuo yiyu zhe wu ru mitu, shi tasuo yiyu zhe zunxun zhenglu. Ta que shi qiangda de, que shi zhi rui de.

Wo que yi paiqian mu sa daizhe wo de xuduo jixiang qu,(wo shuo): Ni ba ni de zongzu cong chongchong hei'an zhong yinru guangming ba. Ni yingdang yi zhen zhu de yixie jinian ri tixing tamen. Duiyu mei ge jianren zhe he gan'en zhe, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.

Dangshi, mu sa ceng dui ta de zongzu shuo: Nimen yingdang mingji zhen zhu ci gei nimen de endian, ta ceng shi nimen tuoli falao de chenmin. Tamen shi nimen zaoshou kuxing, tusha nimen de nanzi, liu xia nimen de nuzi, ci zhong you cong nimen de zhu jiangxia de da nan.
Dangshi, nimen de zhu ceng xuanbu shuo: Ruguo nimen ganxie, wo shi bi dui nimen en shang jia en; ruguo nimen wang'enfuyi, namo, wo de xingfa que shi yanli de.
Mu sa shuo: Ruguo nimen he da dishang de ren tongtong dou wang'enfuyi,(ye wusun yu zhenzhu), yin wei zhenzhu que shi wu qiu de, que shi ke song de.

Nimen yiqian de minzu--nu ha de zongzu, a de ren, sai mo de ren he tamen yihou de ren, zhiyou zhenzhu neng zhidao tamen--nandao zhe deng ren de xiaoxi meiyou lailin nimen ma? Tamen zu zhong de shizhe zhaoshi tamen xuduo mingzheng, dan tamen ba ziji de shouzhi charu kounei, shuo: Women biding buxin nimen suo feng de shiming, women duiyu nimen suo xuanchuan de shiqing, que shi zai shi ren bu'an di yihuo zhi zhong.
